content.p: The Malaysian branch of the Institute of Asia and Pacific Studies (IAPS) rebranded to University of Nottingham Asia Research Institute-Malaysia (UoNARI-M) was formed in 2013. UoNARI-M joins with the existing branches of the institute at the University of Nottingham campuses in the UK and China. The primary goals of this tri-campus collaboration are to: To learn more about our members, research and study opportunities, please follow the links below. Learn more about our members and the aims and goals of the institute. Find out more about related taught-postgraduate programmes. Browse our current research projects.
